text.section:
On receipt of an application and a $15 nonrefundable fee to take the inspection mechanic exam, the Division shall:
Administer an exam to each mechanic applicant; and
If the applicant is determined to be qualified, register the mechanic to conduct vehicle inspections.
The Division may establish standards by rule or regulation for the testing, qualifying, and registering of inspection station mechanics.

The Division may:
For cause, suspend or revoke the mechanic's registration; and
On suspension or revocation of the mechanic's registration, rescind the authorization to conduct vehicle inspections in accordance with this title.
